about.page_description: Discover Salut Annecy, your guide to experiencing the best of the region
about.mission_text: Salut Annecy is your go-to guide for discovering and experiencing the best of the Annecy region. Our mission is to help you explore the restaurants, activities, accommodations, and events that make our area so rich.
about.who_text: We are a team passionate about our region and dedicated to sharing the best addresses and experiences with you. Whether you're a resident or a visitor, we help you discover all aspects of Annecy.
about.value_authenticity: Authenticity: We prioritize local and authentic establishments
about.value_quality: Quality: We carefully select our recommendations
about.value_sharing: Sharing: We create a community around love for our region
about.value_innovation: Innovation: We use the best technologies to serve you
about.contact_text: For any questions, suggestions, or partnerships, feel free to
